Menu For Week Commencing 24th October 2011

Autograph are proud to be associated with Macmillan Publishing and I hope this is shown in the way our daily menu is constantly changing to anticipate our customers needs.

 

We treat every day differently, and as a fresh food company every ingredient is special.. That’s why we think our food is pretty special too!

 

Because we only buy the freshest ingredients from sustainable and green sources where possible, our menu may change at short notice.. Only because we may have something better to offer!

 

I hope you enjoy..

 

Michael Rodney

Catering Manager

 

               Please note some dishes will include wheat or gluten if in doubt please ask.
